name: Wizard Duel (Derek Duong)
description:
This is a reupload of a previous 1v1 game that was made for a game jam.

Wizard Duel is a top down twin stick 1 vs 1 match point stand off where you must eliminate the other wizard before the lava walls close in. Use power ups to blow up the ground, send a wave of lightning to shock your opponent or to slow him down with a freezing blizzard!

Game requires 2 xbox controllers to play, offline only.
